title: Connected
alt: Or love in general, for that matter. It just leads to the idea that either your love is pure, perfect, and eternal, and you are storybook-compatible in every way with no problems, or you're LYING when you say 'I love you'.
transcript:
[Megan sits on a rock and Cueball sits on the grass.]
Megan: Seriously? I like that song too!
Megan: I bet no two people in the history of the world have ever been so connected![Caption below the frame:]
I'm not sure why we romanticize "young love."
